name: The Other Realm
description:
**Note: This game is currently still in development. 

The concept of this game was to build an experience influenced by horror themes. This game is a piece of a graphic novel I am also working on. 

Loriel is a young teenage girl known to keep to herself. Her days are normal. She wakes up, cleans herself up, goes to school, comes back home and then sleep. One day she wakes up and something in wrong. 

Play the game to find out more.
